item.title: Measuring the Quality of Decisions in Hindsight: A Comprehensive Guide for Leaders
item.description: # Evaluating Decision Quality: A Comprehensive Guide for Engineering Leaders Introduction What if the success of your engineering projects didn’t solely depend on the outcomes, but on the quality of decisions that led to those outcomes? Would you approach your decision-making process differently? In this comprehensive guide, we delve into the role of decision analysis and how engineering leaders can use it to drive innovative success and continuous learning.

item.title: Unlock Organizational Transformation with Consent-Based Decision-Making
item.description: Decisions: they are fundamental to any organization. They shape strategy, influence culture, and define our daily work. But who gets to make these decisions, and how? That’s a question that’s been the subject of much debate and experimentation, and the answer can have a profound impact on the success and culture of an organization. All too often I’ve seen teams making incredibly important decisions with no thought into how they come to the decision.
